page.title: 07Living in Hexton Village
page.content: {106}people including 16 children live in{Hexton Village.}The longest time someone has lived in Hexton is 85 years. 23 residents work in the village, mostly on the Manor Farm or Estate, and 20 people go to work elsewhere. A wine merchant is converting a barn to store stock, there is a warehouse for china goods and an antique repairs business.The only other work is running{The Raven,} and the{Post Office}which also sells sweets and ice creams.In most gardens residents grow vegetables and flowers. People choose to live here because it is{quiet and peaceful}and the country_ side is so beautiful. One drawback is the lack of{public transport.}There is a daily bus{to Luton}and one on market day, Tuesday, to Hitchin. Most house_ holds own a car and use it to shop in the nearby towns of Hitchin and Luton.
